[Ghost](https://ghost.org) is an open source blogging platform written in JavaScript and distributed under the [MIT License](https://opensource.org/license/mit/).

### Examples

The following science blogs use Ghost as a platform:

* [Upstream](https://upstream.force11.org) - The community blog for all things Open Research.
* [OA.Works Blog](https://blog.oa.works/)
